Marri activity contined to cutting telegraphs. Kketrans seem to have burnt ^ -d^ete^^ and rest house at Rakhni and Chowatta post between Rakhiii and Barkhan.Punitive force now moving to Duki, and advance from Duki will be made about 17th March.1
